points.name: Central Park
points.description: A beautiful urban park featuring walking trails, a lake, and seasonal events.

points.name: Historic Library
points.description: A stunning Victorian-era library with original architecture and modern amenities.

points.name: Art Museum
points.description: Home to local and international art exhibitions year-round.

points.name: Farmers Market
points.description: Weekly market featuring local produce, crafts, and entertainment.

points.name: Riverside Walk
points.description: Scenic walking path along the river with beautiful sunset views.

points.name: Heritage Theater
points.description: Historic theater showcasing local performances and classic films.

points.name: Botanical Gardens
points.description: Five acres of beautifully maintained gardens and greenhouses.

points.name: City Observatory
points.description: Public observatory offering guided tours and stargazing events.
